message: Let's start fair. I take most of the money, but you get a small share to start.
Your starting offer was a bit harsh, don't you think? I'm willing to be reasonable, but this is a time-sensitive negotiation for you.

Okay, I see you're not going to budge easily. Let's be a little more realistic here. This offer is a slight concession on my end, but with each passing round, we're losing value. Let's work together to make this worthwhile for both of us.
Alice, you're playing a dangerous game with this inflation.  I'm offering a reasonable split that benefits us both. Let's be smart about this before time runs out.
